ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: SoulStice, if the base has special shields that would make this move impossible, please tell me and I ll rewrite. I m assuming the Mafia base has similar

SoulStice, if the base has special shields that would make this move 
impossible, please tell me and I'll rewrite. I'm assuming the Mafia base has 
similar shields to the other bases, but its your base. If you object, I'll 
void this post.

::Bloodystrike/Reptilica::

Reptilica dives out of the way, a few shots hitting him but the rest heading 
for the autogun that he had been firing at.

"Let's get otta here!" he yells to Bloodystrike, jumping away from the base. 
He passes through the shield, most of his remaining armor melting away at the 
energy. His jetpack sputters a bit before activating again, sending him 
flying, rather uncontrollably, in the direction of the Alliance base, barely 
managing to stay conscious.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike yells in pain as he attempts, but fails, to completely dodge 
Sharpedge's sword. Following Reptilica's example, he jumps through the 
shield, taking off toward the Alliance base.

Being less damaged, he gets through easier than Reptilica.
